name: BE Intent
tag_list: employee-engagement, emotional-intelligence, staff-morale, compliance, health, motivation, leadership-tools
overview:
Our objective is to make it easy and affordable for organisations to create inspired and productive employees, and tools that enable high performance teams and managers.

BE Intent is two powerful cloud based tools.

Firstly it is a desktop app that creates more inspired by productive employees. Built on the foundation of latest neuro-science and positive psychology research, the tool firstly prompts what state of mind the employee is in, what they need to be for the day, and delivers a combination of personalised attitudinal adjusters, well-being and strategic organisational messaging. This results in increased self-awareness, emotional intelligence and health behaviors. We see an increase in productivity, loyalty and health and a reduction on absence and apathy.

The second tool is a world first leadership dashboard that through dynamic reporting leaders can make better decisions faster and have a daily engagement measure.

BE Intents unique delivery system means that you can have “front-of-mind” whatever you want, including making training more dynamic and contextual. Increasing the retention by 40%.

BE Intent makes it easy to reach your potential.
